# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates an activity items configuration metadata key.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ rawValue: String)
```

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates an activity items configuration metadata key with the specified raw value.

items.description: Creates an activity items configuration metadata key with the specified raw value.
items.name: init(rawValue:)
